name: foodclouds
tag_list: gardening, agriculture, food-production, edible, automated, hardware, hydroponic, aquaponic, vegetables, lettuce, food
overview:
foodclouds is building internet-connected automated gardening devices to make growing food easier for everyone, everywhere.

The company offers two products; one is a completely automated hydroponic or aquaponic controller, available integrated into a complete growing setup, or as a stand-alone controller for integration into an existing or DIY system.

The second product is a garden monitoring and control stake, that connects to your WiFi network and provides real-time sensor data to the foodclouds remote control web interface. The stake can also be used to schedule automated watering with a garden hose.
